nhc_headline: ...PILAR HEADING WESTWARD OVER THE TROPICAL EASTERN PACIFIC... ...NO CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
summary:
...PILAR HEADING WESTWARD OVER THE TROPICAL EASTERN PACIFIC... ...NO CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
 As of 9:00 AM MDT Sat Nov 4
 the center of Pilar was located near 10.2, -109.1
 with movement W at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
